Spawn() Spawngame.logic.tilespawner.ZPiece game.logic.tilespawner.ZPieceSpawn
ITileable game.logic.tilespawner.ZPiece.Spawn ( )[inline]
Spawns a new tile and returns it.
Returns
A new instance of ITileable representing a red tile.
This method creates a new tile object of type Tile with a red color. It also logs a message to the debug console for tracking purposes. The returned tile can be used in various contexts where an ITileable object is required. Ensure that the necessary components are in place to utilize the spawned tile effectively.
Implements game.logic.tilespawner.ISpawnable.
